creatures.name: Maggot-Infested Bird
creatures.description: Just a common bird that has now gained super-bird powers. However, it is now covered in writhing maggots that feast on its decaying flesh. Its wings are tattered, and its movements are sluggish.

creatures.name: Abhorrently Large Cockroach
creatures.description: A monstrous cockroach of unnatural size, its chitinous exoskeleton gleams in the dim light. Its legs scuttle with an eerie quickness, leaving a trail of poisionous filth.

creatures.name: Lingering Bookworm
creatures.description: A mutated bookworm that has grown to an alarming size. Its body is covered in tiny, wriggling tendrils, and it hungers for the taste of knowledge and flesh alike.
